Metadata: Willamette Water 2100: anticipating water scarcity and informing integrative water system response (fact sheet)

A handout describing the five-year project that is evaluating how climate change, population growth, and economic growth will alter the availability and the use of water in the Willamette River Basin on a decadal to centennial timescale. The project is a collaorative effort of faculty from Oregon State University, the University of Oregon, and Portland State University.
